review: Thankyou dr. kamra for your suggestion and treatment you have given . I am always happy with your clinic vibes and your understanding nature.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Kamara explained the problem and suggested the appropriate medical procedure for the complete treatment. Also explained various options available based on the cost involved, benefits and limitations of various options. The sanitation level within clinic and during the treatment was maintained at highest level. The team was professional and courteous.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited the Dr for the first timeand l am extremely satisfied with him.Dr kamra has excellent communication skills and builds a good rapport with the patient.His guidance and treatment is par excellence.May the Divine be by his side for times to come.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I would like to thanks Dr. Kamra for the treatment. He's everything that anyone wants in a dentist. I really appreciate the way he explained all the problems related to my dental issues. He makes me feel comfortable to ask anything....I've learned so many things related to oral care that has never told by any other dentist. The appointment schedule management in a unique way followed by him never bother to wait outside for long time. Most of all the clinical hygiene is excellent. I recommend all my friends to get dental treatment from Dr. Kamra...
reply_text: Thanks a lot for your valuable feedback.

review: We were welcome to a very warm and patient friendly environment .Dr. Kamra was very particular and made sure that all my appointments started right on time  .I would specially emphasise on the neatness being maintained in the clinic along with the best quality dental treatment being provided.I thank Dr. Kamra for giving personal care and attention towards me. The clinic is fully equipped with all modern dental equipments and gadgets. I surely recommend him to everyone in need. Wish him all the best.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Your commitment in providing comprehensive dental care is commendable. I appreciate you took time to thoroughly examine oral health and revision various treatments available to me. Your attention to detail and willingness to address my concern ensued I received best possible care. 
Thanks!

review: Well..it was an amazing experience with the dentist..especially I would like to express my deep gratitude and big thanks ** ***** *** * ***** ********* ***** * *** ********* *********.Everyone present there were extremely very caring .I felt as though I didn't had any pain earlier..Overall it was a great time with Kamras.

The time management as per the appointment is excellent. I didn't have to wait for long. Proper hygiene and cleanliness is maintained. The doctor explained the issue and did the best Root Canal Treatment. I am very happy and satisfied with the treatment.
reply_text: Thanks Jitender ji for your valuable feedback.

review:
** ***** ** *** ******* ******* **** * ***** **** ** ********* ****
For any dental prob wherever I am only Dr kamra click to me.. after 20 yrs of my RC by him only again m here.
People ask me why you have chosen a distant doctor couldn‚Äôt you find any dentist at my location.. i just told them that i go to him not for the treatment which i can get from anywhere.. i go to him coz i have blind trust.. his best advise and successful treatment.
Thanks Dr kamra after 20 yrs from now would like to meet you again for the another RC.. like m playing 20-20 with him.. 
wishing you good luck.

In my opinion Dr kamra is fully capable for any dental problems and fully satisfies the patient. I have been regular to his clinic for last 20 years and have got implants done and root canal treatment and crowns and bridges done from Dr. Kamra. He works in a very comfortable environment without causing any pain and takes utmost care of his patients. *** ** ** ** *** **** ******* *** would surely recommend him to everyone.
